idea-plugin.name: SvgEasy
idea-plugin.description:
SVGEazy is an IntelliJ Platform plugin designed specifically for SVG files, delivering an intuitive and real-time code editing + visual preview experience.

Key Features:

  • Side-by-Side Real-Time Preview: Left side uses the native IntelliJ editor with full XML/SVG syntax highlighting, code folding, and completion; right side provides high-fidelity real-time rendering powered by JCEF — what you edit is what you see.
  • Flexible Layout Switching: Quickly toggle between “Split View”, “Preview Only”, and “Editor Only” modes via right-click context menu to suit different workflows.
  • Seamless Theme Sync: Preview background perfectly matches the current IDEA theme (Light, Darcula, etc.), with optional subtle transparency for a more natural and comfortable look.
  • File Info at a Glance: Displays SVG dimensions (e.g., 256×156) and file size (e.g., 818 B) directly in the preview area for quick reference.
  • Native Experience: All interactions use standard IntelliJ Platform components — consistent style, no flickering, smooth performance.

Whether you're an icon designer, front-end developer, or anyone who frequently works with SVG files, SVGEazy significantly boosts your productivity and visual feedback.
